topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545638906368726ab2cc0200#post_545638906368726ab2cc0200
We don't celebrate Halloween but my girl and I went to a costume party/highschool reunion. few of them were surprised. Those who didn't know we were dating.
topics.author: 52f0834d63687261cba90300

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545638906368726ab2cc0200#post_545638906368726ab2cc0200
[bq="And Brother I Hurt People"]I know it's late, but how were your Halloweens?[/bq]
I've already talked about it, but I crossplayed at school and didn't get any asinine comments.  The reason why I'm excited is because that means I can start trapping without having to worry.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body: Mine was nice, thank you. Dressing as a generic witch gave me an excuse to wear my orange and black stockings! How was yours?

topics.body:
Hey, Marc. As for me, guys, I'm just wasting time uploading some gameplay of me playing Ultra Street Fighter IV thanks to its built-in YouTube replay feature. Gotta tell ya, I'm kinda embarrassed since I'm HARDLY a pro.... I usually just play for fun :)

I also have been working on idea for _Naruto: The Demon Within_, a Naruto AU RP I am doing with my best friend Kurt.
